qas.question: How many inhabitants does Egypt have?
What is the rank of Egypt popultaion among African nations?
Majority of Egypt people live near what river?
What desert constitutes most of Egypt territory?

context: With <a0_0>over 90 million<a0_0/> inhabitants, Egypt is the most populous country in North Africa and the Arab World, the <a1_0>third-most populous in Africa<a1_0/> (after Nigeria and Ethiopia), and the fifteenth-most populous in the world. The great majority of its people live near the banks of the <a2_0>Nile River<a2_0/>, an area of about 40,000 square kilometres (15,000 sq mi), where the only arable land is found. The large regions of the <a3_0>Sahara desert<a3_0/>, which constitute most of Egypt's territory, are sparsely inhabited. About half of Egypt's residents live in urban areas, with most spread across the densely populated centres of greater Cairo, Alexandria and other major cities in the Nile Delta.
